text: Béla Békessy (16 November 1875 - 6 July 1916) was a Hungarian fencer. He won a silver medal in the individual sabre event at the 1912 Summer Olympics. He was killed in action during World War I. ==See also== * List of Olympians killed in World War I ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1875 births Category:1916 deaths Category:Austro-Hungarian military personnel killed in World War I Category:Hungarian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Hungary Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Sportspeople from Debrecen Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Medalists at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Béla Békessy
